document_data.name: Ghazrim DuLoc
document_data.mainbody: '''Ghazrim DuLoc''' was the [[Zhentarim]]'s main representative in [[Mantol-Derith]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Ghazrim was born to a wealthy family in [[Amn]]. In later life, he joined the Zhentarim and was appointed as their representative in the crucial garrison of Mantol-Derith.

''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], he was the only bulwark against the chaos spreading in the trading post, with [[duergar]] and [[deep gnome]]s making war on each other and the [[drow]] ready to seize total control of the place. However, the drow representative [[Sirak Mazelor]] needed Ghazrim's approval of her plan in order to act.
document_data.Personality: Ghazrim had the typically smarmy demeanor of the Amnian aristocracy coupled with a biting sense of humor that he used to diffuse tense situations. He liked a good battle but not with superior enemy troops.
document_data.Relationships: Ghazrim had with [[Lorthuun]], the leading [[beholder]] of the garrison, a relationship like that of a married couple, bickering and insulting each other but knowing both were loyal to the Black Network.
document_data.Possessions: Ghazrim possessed a very rare magical [[gold]] [[ring]] fitted with a [[star ruby]] that could guide the ring's wearer along the safest and shortest route to [[Gravenhollow]].
